game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientGame, ServerGame

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Ian Laird Game represents the Game of Snake. It contains a Screen, Snakes, and the location of the power up.
